banner.txt: This website shows my development and experience in software development using Java, SQL, Angular, C# and Python. Also, I have been working with Kotlin, MongoDB and Hibernate. I'm continue learning to improve my skills.

proyects.proyect4: AI project implementing a content-based anime recommendation system that analyzes user preferences and uses TF-IDF and SVD to suggest similar titles not yet watched.
